title: Len Jordan (rugby league)
text:
Leonard Roy Jordan (24 January 1920 – 6 November 2014) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer. A , Jordan represented <a href="Auckland%20rugby%20league%20team">Auckland</a> at a provincial level, and was a member of the <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand national team</a> from 1946 to 1949. He played 29 matches for the Kiwis, including seven test matches. In the 1970s, his son <a href="Chris%20Jordan%20%28rugby%20league%29">Chris</a> also played international league for New Zealand.
He was a <a href="Northcote%20Tigers">Northcote Tigers</a> junior.
